name: idnes.cz - dark updated
additional_info:
Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/56111/idnes-cz-dark . It's been a long time since this style was updated so I tweaked it a little. Also changed the colors a bit to be more contrast.
Also keep in mind this theme does not work as an adblocker. Ads may mess with the theme.

Version 2.0
- update for idnes 2019 version

Version 1.3
- fixed idnes.tv widget
- fixed embed social media box
- fixed idnes.tv site

Version 1.2
- fixed social buttons
- fixed footer
Version 1.1
- fixed arrows
- fixed menu
- fixed sports section titles
Version 1.0
- initial release
